name: smuggling
content:

the act or process of taking things or people to or from a place secretly and often illegally: The murdered man is thought to have been involved in drug smuggling. Nine people are in custody in the Netherlands charged with people smuggling. See
smuggle
More examplesFewer examplesThe seizure represented a breakthrough in the battle against arms smuggling.The UK Coastguard was formed in 1822 to combat smuggling. Many traffickers have set up smuggling rings that rely heavily on young couriers.
